accountId.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID that owns the cluster.

clusterIdentifier.description: The cluster identifier of the cluster that receives data from the partner.

databaseName.description: The name of the database that receives data from the partner.

partnerName.description: The name of the partner that is authorized to send data.

statusMessage.description: (Optional) The status message provided by the partner.
